name: Flying Lion
movement: walking speed of 30 feet and flying speed of 80 feet
description: The Flying Lion is a large monstrosity with formidable strength and resilience. It boasts large wings that grant it impressive flying speed, alongside a powerful physique suitable for melee combat. Its keen smell enhances its perceptiveness.
memorable: Notably combines aerial mobility with strong physical prowess, making it a versatile and dangerous predator.
goals: Actively hunts prey using its speed and strength, typically engaging in ambush tactics.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other aerial predators or within regions that support large beasts.
environment: Prefers open skies and areas where it can take advantage of height during combat.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores enhance its durability and melee damage output, along with excellent flying capabilities.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma limit its tactical versatility and social interactions.
attacks: Can perform two attacks in a single turn with its bite and talons, dealing significant piercing and slashing damage respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Smell grants it advantage on Perception checks based on smell, enhancing its tracking abilities.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 15, allowing it to be aware of its surroundings effectively.
skills: Exceptional skill in perception with a +5 modifier, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Can grapple targets, making it easier to control and deal damage.
Strong melee attacks paired with aerial movement give it a unique combat edge.
test_queries: strong flying predator with keen senses
large beast capable of aerial attacks
aerial creature with powerful melee attacks
formidable lion monster with strength and speed
flying lion skilled in tracking and combat
